metadata.synopsis: The party comments on the resolution of the Sentient Amulet situation - the Mad Monk disappears into thin air and "moves on". We either suffered through his laughing madness (we were temporarily possessed) or fought him.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe SAM_Crypt"- Interact with S_WYR_SentientAmulet_Tomb_Lid_97f1280f-f052-4988-b59d-5f972c9651d6- Go through the dialogue - either suffering through the Mad Monk's madness or engaging in combat. After the Mad Monk disappears once and for all, a companion will react with this PAD.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I hate it had to end like this. A torturous fate by any measure.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: He's gone. Well - he was always good for a laugh.
